multiple-choice.question: You are given a fair die that has six faces. One face has the letter $a$ on it, two faces have the letter $b$ on them, and three faces have the letter $c$ on them. Assume you roll this die twice, independently of each other. Define the events [defs] A = "both rolls result in the same letter", B = "at least one of the rolls results in the letter $a$". [/defs] What is $\Pr(A|B)$?
